root_causes.description: High volume of AR exceptions indicating potential data entry errors or system integration issues.
Duplicate bank records suggest inadequate reconciliation processes.
root_causes.financial_impact: Potential for financial misstatements due to duplicate records

remediations.action: Implement enhanced validation checks for AR data entries and review system integration points.
remediations.estimated_effort: 2-3 weeks with dedicated data quality team
remediations.success_criteria: Reduction in AR exceptions by 80% in the next financial period

remediations.action: Revise bank reconciliation procedures to include duplicate detection and resolution steps.
remediations.success_criteria: Elimination of duplicate bank records in subsequent reconciliations
